front.title: Configuration of Pro-Active Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) Functions for MPLS-based Transport Networks using RSVP-TE

abstract.t: This specification describes the configuration of pro-active MPLS-TP (MPLS-Transport Profile) Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) Functions for a given LSP using a set of TLVs that are carried by the GMPLS RSVP-TE protocol based on the OAM Configuration Framework for GMPLS RSVP-TE.
